verses.esv:
6   Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me
    all the days of my life,
  and I shall dwell in the house of the LORD
    forever.
verses.kjv: 6 Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
verses.niv: 6 Surely goodness and love will follow me all the days of my life, and I will dwell in the house of the LORD forever.

verses.esv:
8   Oh, taste and see that the LORD is good!
    Blessed is the man who takes refuge in him!
verses.kjv: 8 O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
verses.niv: 8 Taste and see that the LORD is good; blessed is the man who takes refuge in him.

verses.esv:
19   Oh, how abundant is your goodness,
    which you have stored up for those who fear you
  and worked for those who take refuge in you,
    in the sight of the children of mankind!
verses.kjv: 19 Oh how great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee; which thou hast wrought for them that trust in thee before the sons of men!
verses.niv: 19 How great is your goodness, which you have stored up for those who fear you, which you bestow in the sight of men on those who take refuge in you.

verses.esv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, 23 gentleness, self-control; against such things there is no law.
verses.kjv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith, 23 Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.
verses.niv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, 23 gentleness and self-control. Against such things there is no law.

verses.esv: 28 And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good, for those who are called according to his purpose.
verses.kjv: 28 And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
verses.niv: 28 And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.

verses.esv:
13   I believe that I shall look upon the goodness of the LORD
    in the land of the living!
verses.kjv: 13 I had fainted, unless I had believed to see the goodness of the LORD in the land of the living.
verses.niv: 13 I am still confident of this: I will see the goodness of the LORD in the land of the living.

verses.esv: 17 Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of lights, with whom there is no variation or shadow due to change.
verses.kjv: 17 Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights, with whom is no variableness, neither shadow of turning.
verses.niv: 17 Every good and perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of the heavenly lights, who does not change like shifting shadows.

verses.esv: 4 Or do you presume on the riches of his kindness and forbearance and patience, not knowing that God’s kindness is meant to lead you to repentance?
verses.kjv: 4 Or despisest thou the riches of his goodness and forbearance and longsuffering; not knowing that the goodness of God leadeth thee to repentance?
verses.niv: 4 Or do you show contempt for the riches of his kindness, tolerance and patience, not realizing that God's kindness leads you toward repentance?

verses.esv:
7   The LORD is good,
    a stronghold in the day of trouble;
  he knows those who take refuge in him.
verses.kjv: 7 The LORD is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.
verses.niv: 7 The LORD is good, a refuge in times of trouble. He cares for those who trust in him,

verses.esv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,
verses.kjv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,
verses.niv: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,

verses.esv: 9 Let love be genuine. Abhor what is evil; hold fast to what is good.
verses.kjv: 9 Let love be without dissimulation. Abhor that which is evil; cleave to that which is good.
verses.niv: 9 Love must be sincere. Hate what is evil; cling to what is good.

verses.esv: 18 And Jesus said to him, “Why do you call me good? No one is good except God alone.
verses.kjv: 18 And Jesus said unto him, Why callest thou me good? there is none good but one, that is, God.
verses.niv: 18 "Why do you call me good?" Jesus answered. "No one is good--except God alone.

verses.esv: 10 So then, as we have opportunity, let us do good to everyone, and especially to those who are of the household of faith.
verses.kjv: 10 As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all men, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.
verses.niv: 10 Therefore, as we have opportunity, let us do good to all people, especially to those who belong to the family of believers.

verses.esv:
9   The LORD is good to all,
    and his mercy is over all that he has made.
verses.kjv: 9 The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.
verses.niv: 9 The LORD is good to all; he has compassion on all he has made.

verses.esv:
68   You are good and do good;
    teach me your statutes.
verses.kjv: 68 Thou art good, and doest good; teach me thy statutes.
verses.niv: 68 You are good, and what you do is good; teach me your decrees.

verses.esv:
11   For the LORD God is a sun and shield;
    the LORD bestows favor and honor.
  No good thing does he withhold
    from those who walk uprightly.
verses.kjv: 11 For the LORD God is a sun and shield: the LORD will give grace and glory: no good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly.
verses.niv: 11 For the LORD God is a sun and shield; the LORD bestows favor and honor; no good thing does he withhold from those whose walk is blameless.

verses.esv: 19 And he said, “I will make all my goodness pass before you and will proclaim before you my name ‘The LORD.’ And I will be gracious to whom I will be gracious, and will show mercy on whom I will show mercy.
verses.kjv: 19 And he said, I will make all my goodness pass before thee, and I will proclaim the name of the LORD before thee; and will be gracious to whom I will be gracious, and will shew mercy on whom I will shew mercy.
verses.niv: 19 And the LORD said, "I will cause all my goodness to pass in front of you, and I will proclaim my name, the LORD, in your presence. I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy, and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion.

verses.esv: 32 Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, as God in Christ forgave you.
verses.kjv: 32 And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ’s sake hath forgiven you.
verses.niv: 32 Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you.

verses.esv: 2 Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect.
verses.kjv: 2 And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.
verses.niv: 2 Do not conform any longer to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind. Then you will be able to test and approve what God's will is--his good, pleasing and perfect will.

verses.esv:
8   He has told you, O man, what is good;
    and what does the LORD require of you
  but to do justice, and to love kindness,
    and to walk humbly with your God?
verses.kjv: 8 He hath shewed thee, O man, what is good; and what doth the LORD require of thee, but to do justly, and to love mercy, and to walk humbly with thy God?
verses.niv: 8 He has showed you, O man, what is good. And what does the LORD require of you? To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with your God.

verses.esv:
107:1   Oh give thanks to the LORD, for he is good,
    for his steadfast love endures forever!
verses.kjv: 1 O give thanks unto the LORD, for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
verses.niv: 1 Give thanks to the LORD, for he is good; his love endures forever.

verses.esv: 33 Do not be deceived: “Bad company ruins good morals.”
verses.kjv: 33 Be not deceived: evil communications corrupt good manners.
verses.niv: 33 Do not be misled: "Bad company corrupts good character."

verses.esv: 21 Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.
verses.kjv: 21 Be not overcome of evil, but overcome evil with good.
verses.niv: 21 Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.

verses.esv: 14 who gave himself for us to redeem us from all lawlessness and to purify for himself a people for his own possession who are zealous for good works.
verses.kjv: 14 Who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.
verses.niv: 14 who gave himself for us to redeem us from all wickedness and to purify for himself a people that are his very own, eager to do what is good.

verses.esv:
7   Remember not the sins of my youth or my transgressions;
    according to your steadfast love remember me,
    for the sake of your goodness, O LORD!
verses.kjv: 7 Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness’ sake, O LORD.
verses.niv: 7 Remember not the sins of my youth and my rebellious ways; according to your love remember me, for you are good, O LORD.
